metadata.title: CVE-2020-25201 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: HashiCorp Consul Enterprise version 1.7.0 up to 1.8.4 includes a namespacereplication bug which can be triggered to cause denial of service viainfinite Raft writes. Fixed in 1.7.9 and 1.8.5.

criterions.comment: consul: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
